QuestData.Title: Flight to Razor Hill
QuestData.Description: When you're ready to take the wind rider down to Razor Hill, simply speak with me again. When you get there, waste no time in finding Gar'Thok. He's the one responsible for preparing reports on recent Alliance activity in Durotar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Doras to purchase a wind rider ride to Razor Hill. Once you arrive, speak with Gar'Thok.
QuestData.RewardText: Eitrigg sent you? The warchief must be getting anxious to read my reports. I'd've sent them long ago, but each day we discover more about the Alliance's plans for invading Durotar.
